segments.text: I can't believe what I'm seeing here.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The mess from the overflowing sink is just appalling.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is everywhere, seeping into everything.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the woman just keeps wiping that plate, completely ignorant.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's such a waste of water, let alone the damage it's causing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Then there are the children, creating their own chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Climbing on a wobbly stool for cookies, how reckless.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to take charge and fix this entire situation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The domestic bliss portrayed by the outside garden is a complete lie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This kitchen is a disaster waiting to happen, or already happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It really grates on my nerves to see such a lack of attention.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole thing is just a complete and utter mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It frankly makes me feel quite nauseous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just want to turn away from this scene.
segments.speaker: PAR
